pkgmetadata.longdescription: flipflop========flipflop is a FastCGI/WSGI gateway.https://github.com/Kozea/flipflopThis module is a simplified fork of flup, written by Allan Saddi. It only hasthe FastCGI part of the original module.| #!/usr/bin/env python| from myapplication import app| from flipflop import WSGIServer| WSGIServer(app).run()flipflop is released under the BSD 2-Clause license.
